GET.summary: Get a list of all incidents
GET.description: Get a list of all incidents

parameters.name: incident[name]
parameters.description: The name of the incident

parameters.name: incident[status]
parameters.description: The status, one of investigating|identified|monitoring|resolved (optional, defaults to investigating if left blank)

parameters.name: incident[message]
parameters.description: The initial message, created as the first incident update (optional)

parameters.name: incident[wants_twitter_update]
parameters.description: Post the new incident to twitter (t or f, defaults to f)

parameters.name: incident[impact_override]
parameters.description: Override calculated impact value, one of none|minor|major|critical (optional)

parameters.name: incident[component_ids]
parameters.description: List of components whose subscribers should be notified (only applicable for pages with component subscriptions enabled)

parameters.name: incident[scheduled_for]
parameters.description: time the scheduled maintenance should begin (ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: incident[scheduled_until]
parameters.description: time the scheduled maintenance should end (ISO8601 format)

parameters.name: incident[scheduled_remind_prior]
parameters.description: Remind subscribers 60 minutes before scheduled start (optional, t or f, defaults to f)

parameters.name: incident[scheduled_auto_in_progress]
parameters.description: Automatically transition incident to 'In Progress' at start (optional, t or f, defaults to f)

parameters.name: incident[scheduled_auto_completed]
parameters.description: Automatically transition incident to 'Completed' at end (optional, t or f, defaults to f)

parameters.name: incident[backfilled]
parameters.description: Must be set to t

parameters.name: incident[backfill_date]
parameters.description: Date of incident in YYYY
